name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-dynamic-form-with-location-picker
title: Dynamic Form with location picker
shortDescription: This solution implements a simple Form Customizer with a Dynamic Form with a location picker, to demonstrate the many usages of a Dynamic Form.
longDescription: This solution implements a simple Form Customizer with a Dynamic Form with a location picker, to demonstrate the many usages of a Dynamic Form.

references.name: Building a SharePoint New Site Form Look-Alike
references.description: A post on building a SPFx Form Customizer with a Dynamic Site with field overrides to create an experience that looks like the default SharePoint new site form.
